name: Drug Free Snapback
description:
Limited edition run of 100 pieces per colorway!

PREORDERING NOW

We are putting these snapbacks up for pre-order so that you can take advantage of our Black Friday Weekend sale. They've just been finished and are now being shipped to the US.

Will they get held up in customs? We don't know. Will the USPS be able to deliver them to your door before Christmas? We hope so, but we can't guarantee it.

- Grey embroidery with white outline.
- Custom hang tag so you know it''s legit
- Finished on the closure and headband with custom fabric tags.
- 100% acrylic
- 100 hats per colorway

Shipping & Handling

USA: $9
CAN: $12.50
INTL (Air): $20

Made in China.

Ships from the US

name: Proud To Be Drug Free Crewneck
description:
Limited edition run of 24 sweaters

NOW ON SALE

IN PRODUCTION OCT 25TH

SHIPS WEEK OF NOV 18TH

We are proud to present one of two brand new crewneck sweatshirts, in a limited edition run of only 24 sweaters, ever. Proud To Be Drug Free, Straight Edge, True Til Death.

Printed on an athletic heather 50/50 cotton/poly 14 oz super heavyweight Gildan crewneck, with a printed label at the shoulder featuring our seal of authenticity.

Hand tagged with one of our custom STRAIGHTEDGEWORLDWIDE card tags, so you know it''s legit. Shipped in a 100% recycled paper eco-mailer, because we're down like that.

- 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester
- Hand tagged

PS if you are a dude with a waist smaller than 35", you can totally pull these off.

name: Book - Dumb Questions About Straight Edge Vol. 1
description:
Straight Edge is not a joke!

SHIPPING THIS WEEK!

Finally, after a long awaited delay, the book event of the season is happening! Our Dumb Questions About Straight Edge Volume 1 is set for release as both a paperback, and an eBook!

This marvelous literary masterpiece has been compiled from our Tumblr page and features all the hits, including:
- Am I still straight edge if...?
- Why are you so mean?
- Why are you so mean and am I still straight edge if...?

- Paperback, 72 pages - 12pt laminated cardstock cover
- Perfect bound spine - 80lb coated pages

Shipping & Handling Rates

CAN: $8
USA: $5
INTL (Air): $12.50

Ships from the US

DOWNLOADING THE BUNDLE?

Our eBooks are made available in PDF format for compatibility with the most devices!

After placing your order, you will immediately be emailed a secure download link.

Downloads are not unlimited, and will expire! Be sure you download your file onto a secure device, like a desktop or laptop, for safe keeping!

name: Watch - Rose Gold
description:
Rose Gold Beauty

NOW IN STOCK!

The special lady in your life deserves something special on her wrist. This is a square metal watch finished in rose gold, with a floral pattern underneath the white straight edge emblem.

This elegant watch is larger than you might think, with a curved glass face.

Designed with special assistance from Kaila Culham of P.I.T. Crew Ontario.

- rose gold finish
- stainless steel body and back
- watch band fits wrists up to 7-1/2 inches in diameter
- 1-1/16-inch watch face
- 1-5/16-inch watch body
- Bicast leather strap (so not vegan)
- Japanese movement by Citizen
- Battery included

$5 Shipping

Made in China.

name: SXEWORLDWIDE App (Free!)
description:
Your community on the go

ANDROID BETA

Our new smartphone app is exactly what you need to stay connected to the Straight Edge community anywhere... that has reception and if you have data left.

This is a multi-platform app that works exactly like the mobile version of our site. The app is designed to work on iOS, Android, and Amazon platforms.

At this point the Android and iPhone versions are not officially published. However the Android beta can be downloaded below!

All your favorite tabs are here, including:
- Community news
- Tour dates
- Album releases
- Video releases
- Tumblr
- Instagram
- Facebook
- Twitter
- This store
- Exclusive discount codes!
- Straight Edge tattoos
- Our live photos
- Stuff about us
- How to contact us
...and more!

Click here to download the Android beta from Mediafire!

name: Print - Bear No Weakness
description:

NOW AVAILABLE

Holy crap can you picture this awesome full color print hanging on your wall? It's so rad. It's a friggin' bear, a bear!

We've selected print sizes that will fit the most common frame and matte sizes, and rendered the print with Canon Lucia inks on 230gsm archival matte paper.

- Canon Lucia digital ink

description:
Premium quality art print

NOW AVAILABLE

You know you need a print of a tiger framed and hanging on your wall, right? It's a definite improvement. Super classy.

We've selected print sizes that will fit the most common frame and matte sizes, and rendered the print with Canon Lucia inks on 230gsm archival matte paper.

Archival Prints
- Archival matte paper
- Acid-free 230 gsm paper
- Giclee digital print
- Canon Lucia digital ink
- 1/2" border or larger
- Printed in the US
- Ships from the US.
- Ships flat; tube for larger prints
- USPS First Class Mail, lightning fast!

Made in the US

description:
Canvas Shoulder Bags!

Time to add a touch of class to your daily life - canvas shoulder bags. Our new bags are heavyweight cotton canvas, with black trim at the strap and bottom.

The canvas totes are perfect for school, the library, and the beach.

- Heavyweight 100% cotton canvas

- Non-Toxic

Our pal Christian wanted us to make this up for him, so how could we say no? Celebrating your love of all things baking, we have created this epic straight edge / Bake x Life phone case.

Features all the best parts of baking and straight edge, including a rolling pin, a whisk (thanks Dylan!), a one-piece measuring set, and a plaid dishtowel, emblazoned with the anthemic Break Eggs, Not Edge.

In order to preserve the quality of the drawing, we have not removed the texture of the paper on which it was originally drawn.

description:

Your smartphone is a pretty sweet part of who you are. And yet somehow, we've figured out how to make yours even more you. This UNBREAKABLE case will protect your beautiful new smartphone from dust & scratches with a super light-weight durable plastic hardshell case.

The Galaxy S3, iPhone 5, and iPhone 4/4S designs are printed on a wafer-thin aluminum insert, and then sealed with a thick enamel coat. No, the printed insert does not wrap around the sides, so you don't have to worry about it scratching or rubbing off.

All other cases are wraparound cases, printed right on the surface of the case!

name: Straight Edge Flash Calendar (Free!)
description:
Straightedge Worldwide is proud to present:

A FREE DOWNLOADABLE STRAIGHT EDGE FLASH CALENDAR!

It is inspiring to see how many talented young artists there are throughout the straight edge community. We thought that a calendar would be a great way to introduce you to some of these young artists, and also to give you a little something to show your pride throughout the year.

Our free downloadable 2013 straight edge flash calendar can be downloaded and printed out on any 8.5 x 11-inch paper.

This year's calendar features the incredible art of:

Zach Gutierrez
Chris McClean
Seth x Campbell
Jon Basco
Sal Sanchez
Mike Smaczylo
Tony "Trophy" Colon
Timmy Ickes
Loc Huynh
Ash Von Edge
Karina Badillo

name: Straight Edge Live Photography Calendar (Free!)
